channel.title: CVE Feed for HP, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HP, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-27458|2024-10-07T18:48:44.056Z -- hp%2C%20inc. -- hp%20hotkey%20support
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the HP Hotkey Support software, which might allow local escalation of privilege. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability. Customers using HP Programmable Key are recommended to update HP Hotkey Support.

item.title: CVE-2024-27458|2024-10-07T17:02:01.781Z -- hp%2C%20inc. -- hp%20hotkey%20support
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the HP Hotkey Support software, which might allow local escalation of privilege. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability. Customers using HP Programmable Key are recommended to update HP Hotkey Support.

item.title: CVE-2024-8733|2024-10-02T19:56:16.845Z -- hp%2C%20inc. -- hp%20one%20agent%20software
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the HP One Agent for certain HP PC products, which might allow for escalation of privilege. HP is releasing software updates to mitigate this potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-27458|2024-10-07T17:20:14.563Z -- hp%2C%20inc. -- hp%20hotkey%20support
